verses.roman:
vanya śāka-phala-mūla ānibe lakṣmaṇa
tabe sītā karibena pāka-prayojana

synonyms: vanya—of the forest; śāka—vegetables; phala-mūla—fruits and roots; ānibe—will bring; lakṣmaṇa—Lakṣmaṇa; tabe—that time; sītā—mother Sītā; karibena—will do; pāka-prayojana—the necessary cooking.
translation: "When Lakṣmaṇa brings all the vegetables, fruits and roots from the forest, Sītā will do the necessary cooking."
